rows.Name: gc_SMC_FILE_MAXCAMEL
rows.Comment:
The maximum number of cam segments / points that can be read
bySMC_ReadCam.

rows: The maximum number of cam tappets that can be read bySMC_ReadCam.

The base 2 exponent for the act value buffer size.  Must be between 1 and 30.
The size of the buffer will be 2^``gc_SMC_ACT_VALUE_BUFFER_SIZE_BASE2_EXP``.
This buffer is required for using|SMC_ETC_InterpolateAxisPosition|.
The maximum number of switches per track forSMC_DigitalCamSwitch_HighPrecision.

The base 2 exponent for the maximum number of events per track forSMC_DigitalCamSwitch_HighPrecision.  Must be >= 1.
The maximum number of events per track will be
2^``gc_SMC_DIGITAL_CAM_SWITCH_MAX_TOGGLE_EVENTS_BASE2_EXP``.
